SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.decorations

Class MyShelfieRustBorder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.customcomponents.decorations.MyShelfieRustBorder
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyShelfieDecoration
public class MyShelfieRustBorder extends Object implements MyShelfieDecoration
Represents a rust border decoration for a component in the graphical user interface. This class implements the `MyShelfieDecoration` interface.
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emamuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

  • Constructor Details

    • MyShelfieRustBorder

      public MyShelfieRustBorder()
      Constructs a new `MyShelfieRustBorder` decoration. It creates an inner shadow effect for the border.

  • Method Details

    • customize

      public void customize(MyShelfieComponent decoratedComponent)

      The method that defines a customization to be applied on a component

      Specified by:
      customize in interface MyShelfieDecoration
      Parameters:
      decoratedComponent - the component that needs to be customized

    • getRadius

      private double getRadius(javafx.scene.Node decoratedComponent)
      Returns the radius for the border effect based on the size of the decorated component. If the component's width or height is zero, the default radius is used.
      Parameters:
      decoratedComponent - the component for which to calculate the radius
      Returns:
      the radius for the border effect
